feed:
<%- siteInfo.blog_name %> <link href="<%= siteInfo.website_domain %>atom.xml" rel="self"/> <link href="<%= siteInfo.website_domain %>"/> <%= updateTime %> <%= siteInfo.website_domain %>
<%= siteInfo.website_author_name %>
wangwenbo.me <% list.forEach(function(post) { %>
<%- post.title %> <link href="<%= siteInfo.website_domain %>/<%= post.routename %>"/> <%= post.lastdate %> <%= siteInfo.website_domain %>/<%= post.routename %>
<%=post.content%> <a href="<%= siteInfo.website_domain %>/<%= post.routename %>">阅读全文
<% }) %>
